attributes.action: Mobile companies should allow in unused data to be rolled over to the next month
attributes.background: How many of you have mobile phone contracts with limited data but don't use it all and when your billing cycle date comes any unused data is lost mobile companies should transfer any unused data in the next month so we don't loose out on what we pay for

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition because the Government or Parliament is not responsible for the issue you raise. Decisions about unused mobile data are the responsibility of individual network service providers, not of the Government. You could start a new petition asking the Government to require all service providers to roll over unused mobile data to different months.
